response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $15,000, but considering its importance to you, we aim to make it accessible. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $12,000. We believe this is a fair deal that respects both the value of the product and your interest in it. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
